thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com
thread.title: Daniel Spriestersbach
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Daniel Spriestersbach

author: Daniel Spriestersbach
title: Daniel Spriestersbach
text: Since I started getting LTB I have been nothing but pleased. I was already a big fan and this experience added to that. In last months box I didn't get the lizards ( reading some stuff on YouTube I'm not the only one ) and I was a little bummed. I did get a pack of craws instead of them so my item count was right. I kind of figured since I had enough items, I was just out of luck. I sent one email and was responded to very quickly by Taylor saying that my lizards were in the mail. I realize it's only a $5 pack of lizards but it just blew me away. With the fast response and instant product replacement , I'm LTB for life.
